group.name: Plugin Commands: Network Steering
group.description: The Network Steering plugin commands are currently being used for the Profile Interop event.

command.description: Adds a channel to either the primary or secondary channel mask of the network-steering plugin.

arg.name: whichMask
arg.description: The channel mask to add a channel to.

arg.name: channel
arg.description: The channel to add to the mask.

command.description: Subtracts a channel from either the primary or secondary channel mask of the network-steering plugin.

arg.name: whichMask
arg.description: The channel mask to subtract the channel from.

arg.name: channel
arg.description: The channel to subtract the mask from.

command.description: Set either the primary or secondary channel mask.

arg.name: whichMask
arg.description: The channel mask to subtract the channel from.

arg.name: mask
arg.description: The value to set the channel mask to.

command.description: Displays the current status of the network steering process.

arg.name: options
arg.description: A mask of options for indicating specific behavior within the network-steering process.
